snippet: After a three-day hearing, Judge William Sylvester ruled Thursday that there is enough evidence for James E. Holmes to face trial on charges that he killed 12 people and wounded 70 in an Aurora movie theater last summer.
abstract: Colorado Judge William Sylvester rules that there is enough evidence for mass shooting suspect James E Holmes to face trial on charges that he killed 12 people and wounded 70 others in an Aurora movie theater in July 2012.
lead_paragraph: After a three-day hearing, Judge William Sylvester ruled Thursday that there is enough evidence for James E. Holmes to face trial on charges that he killed 12 people and wounded 70 in an Aurora movie theater last summer.

headline.main: Colorado: Suspect in Aurora Massacre Will Face Trial
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Suspect In Aurora Massacre Will Face Trial
